title: U.S. air conditioners shipments 2001 to 2019
summary: In general Number of shipments in millions has fallen over the Year.
Number of shipments in millions is roughly constant from 2003 to 2004, slightly increasing from 2004 to 2005, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2005 to 2008.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2005 and 2006.
The highest Number of shipments in millions, of value 6.47 was reached at Year 2005
Minimum Number of shipments in millions about 3.97 was reached at Year 2008
